Uses of ISysSubject in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.bus
 

Methods in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.bus that return ISysSubject
 ISysSubject ISysBusEvent.getSubject()
          Get the ISysSubject on which the message was received.
 ISysSubject ISysBusEvent.getReplySubject()
          Get the ISysSubject on which the requester is listening.
 ISysSubject ISysBus.createSubject()
          Creates a new instance of ISysSubject.
 ISysSubject ISysBus.getSubject()
          Get the current BaseSubject (if any).
 

Methods in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.bus with parameters of type ISysSubject
 void ISysBus.publish(ISysSubject subject, ISysMessage msg)
          General mechanism to publish a MessageObject.
 void ISysBus.addBusEventListener(ISysSubject subject, ISysBusEventListener listener)
          Subscribes to Messages specified by ISysSubject.
 void ISysBus.addUniqueBusEventListener(ISysSubject subject, ISysBusEventListener listener)
          Applications running in a distributed queue may want to use this method to subscribe.
 ISysMessage ISysBus.request(ISysSubject subject, ISysMessage msg)
          Send a Request, using the currend timeout setting and wait for reply.
 ISysMessage ISysBus.request(ISysSubject subject, ISysMessage msg, long timeout)
          Send a Request, defining a local timeout and wait for reply.
